TopicTitle: Can we get a higher warp factor?

Articles.Content:
When waiting for planetary alignments or going to Jool/Eeloo, even 100000x warp feels too slow, and can require waiting 10+ minutes doing nothing.  Can we get a higher speed of 500000x or 1000000x?

Edited July 8, 2017 by zarakon
About that - I also feel sometimes that the warp limits as you get closer to the planet are sometimes too high. Take gilly for example.

If you do want to have higher time warps, I recommend the mod better time warp. You can modify warp speeds to your specifications, as well as physics warp speeds. Be warned that the higher physics warp you go, the more unstable it gets. Good luck!

On 7/9/2017 at 4:56 PM, Cabbink said:

If you do want to have higher time warps, I recommend the mod better time warp. You can modify warp speeds to your specifications, as well as physics warp speeds. Be warned that the higher physics warp you go, the more unstable it gets. Good luck!

I bet one touch of the controls on 128x physics warp can turn your ship into kraken food.

BTW, use cheat engine to help speed up warp times if they are too slow. That's what many did when time warp didn't exist.
